name: MountainSounds
0:
”Alexa open mountain sounds”
”Alexa ask mountain sounds to play for 8 hours”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mountain sounds
des:
Escape to the serene embrace of nature with our Mountain Sounds. Immerse yourself in the tranquil melodies of wind rustling through trees, birdsong echoing through valleys, and the soothing rhythm of flowing streams. Elevate your environment and find peace in the majestic embrace of the mountains, wherever you are.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Mountain Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
